Detailed Description

This class is a factory for chunk items.

It is up to the factory's 'create' method to actually add the item to the chunk (as a dynamic or static item - or not at all).

This class may be used either by deriving from it and overriding the 'create' method, or by passing a non-NULL creator function into the constructor.

Member Function Documentation

ChunkItemFactory::Result ChunkItemFactory::create ( Chunk *  pChunk,
DataSectionPtr  pSection 
) const [virtual]

This virtual method calls the creator function that was passed in, as long as it's not NULL.

It is called by a Chunk when it encounters the section name.

Returns:
true if succeeded
